Row.Text: Welcome! We're so happy to have you here. I'm very interested in how you managed to find our village here, but we'll have time to discuss that later.
Welcome! Its so nice to see new ponies. If you stay here longer you'll be able to experience true friendship for the first time.
Welcome! If you're a tourist we'd be delighted if you could find the time to visit one of our Cutie Mark Vaults. Our goal that is someday everypony across Equestria could make the pilgrimage to one.
But can't you see that differences only bring bitterness and misery? No matter... Where's that scroll?
You know... I sometimes wish I actually had one of Mage Meadowbrooks 9, sorry "8" enchanted items. No Matter... Where's that scroll?
In hindsight, maybe taking away my General's Cutie Mark wasn't the best idea. No matter... Where's that scroll?
I've noticed a recent imbalance in resource distribution. Would you care to help equalize that?
This might seem to come out of left field but I hate you and everything about you.
Please don't think about this as a conflict, rather think of it as me and my friends taking everything thats special about your people away forever.
In sameness there peace. The problem is I don't see anything similar between us friend!
I expected this way sooner. It took you awhile to muster up your courage didn't it?
Finally. Now I can take all of your lands and not look like a warmonger. You've been a true friend.
I am more prepared now than ever before. Do you comprehend the gravity of your situation?
There are Pilgrims trying to enter my lands and I would very much appreciate it if we could tear down the metaphorical walls between us... Maybe even the physical ones too while we're at it!
I was expecting that some of my Pilgrims would be setting up a town where you built your newest city. I'd advise you to not let this happen again.
Would you kindly consider an equal exchange of goods?
The recent influx of soldiers with heretical Cutie Marks disturbs my people. I'd would ask you to remove them at the nearest convenience.
Welcome back! Have you reconsidered staying? No? Then what do you want?
Welcome back! Its good see friends like you well. Have you reconsidered in us helping to remove that horrible mark on your flank?
Wel-...You keep leaving with your Cutie Mark. I should consider fixing that.
To excel is to fail.
In sameness there is peace.
Exceptionalism is a lie.
Was there ever any doubt?
To excel is to fail. You'd best remember that
I'm going to remember this...
How is that in any way beneficial to the community?
Just take it and leave!
Giving you this will do nothing to curb your hyper-aggresive tendencies.
I suppose this course of action will promote equality.
How about we make a trade? That would be more equal would it not?
I've noticed a recent imbalance in resource distribution. Would you care to help equalize that?
Comply if you value your Cutie Mark!
I'm willing to forget past transgressions for the good of commerce, are you?
Normally I'm all for Equality but I take exception at this transaction.
